results.title: Roma
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Barbara Lemon and ACMI
results.brief_description: Barbara Lemon pays tribute to her grandmother; cheeky, fiesty, caring and resilient. From growing up in Warrigal during the war to the birth of her great grandchildren, Roma has seen a lot in her 102 years and is more than happy to share her stories with her family.

results.title: Taking a chance on love
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Susan Dirgham and ACMI
results.brief_description: Many years ago, Susan Dirgham’s parents took a chance on love, in spite of their differences. Her parent’s leap of faith has inspired Susan Dirgham to throw herself into new experiences and follow her heart, which has taken her to some very unusual places. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: People in red hats
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Jane Curtis and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jane Curtis reflects on how she spent her childhood sitting in the loungeroom of her grandparents home. As her family spoke in a language she didn’t understand, Curtis was transfixed by the painting that hung on her grandparent’s wall. Only as an adult would she discover the mysteries that painting held. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: The Sinking home
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Cameron Sugden and ACMI
results.brief_description: Cam Sugden pays tribute to Mary, the matriarch of a poor Phillippino household in Manila. Despite living in a slum, Mary has endeavoured to create a large cocoon to protect her family. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: Speaking of Mary
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Annie Bolitho and ACMI
results.brief_description: Annie Bolitho tells of some of the questions that trouble her in her job as a funeral celebrant. How well does she know the person she’s remembering. It makes her wonder how well she knew her mother. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

group_siblings.title: Rhonda’s story : spoken by Ada Peterson

results.title: Ada's story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ada Peterson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ada Peterson’s brother received a call twelve years ago from a person they didn’t know. It was their sister, Rhonda, who was taken as a child, a member of what is now known as the stolen generation. After getting over the initial shock and apprehension, getting to know Rhonda and her story has taken Ada’s life in a different direction, bringing her closer to celebrating who she is.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ada Peterson and ACMI

results.title: Kalihgat
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI
results.brief_description: Terry Melvin recalls a cathartic event from his youth, when he travelled as a university student to India. In Calcutta, he worked in a hospice for the dying and destitute and tells of the experiences that have shaped and haunted the person his is today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Terry Melvin and ACMI

results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Robyn Colls and ACMI
results.brief_description: Through Robyn’s tribute to the life and experiences of her mother, May, she gives us some insight of a spirited woman and her connection with the region in which she grew up.

results.title: Italian settlement in the Yarra Valley
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maria McCarthy and ACMI
results.brief_description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maria McCarthy and ACMI
